title: Mastering the Markets: (Reinforcement) Learning About the Stock Market
description: In the stock day trading world, millions of decisions must be made every second. Experienced traders navigate this world by creating an investment strategy, evaluating its results, and modifying their approach based on their profits. Now imagine an AI that could perform the same tasks, eliminating the exhaustive time spent by these day traders. That is the power of reinforcement learning (RL), a technique transforming industries from finance to healthcare.
author: Srinivas Sriram

title: How AI Went from Solving CAPTCHAs to Painting Masterpieces
description: How many times have you had to fill out a CAPTCHA while signing up for anything? Ever thought it was tedious and troublesome? After all, bots nowadays can solve these puzzles better, on average, than human users. So what's the point?
author: Jeffery Kang

title: How Matrices are Used for Speech Recognition
description: Services like Google Translate seem to amazingly understand the meaning behind thousands of languages, contexts, and accents. Even when given broken sentences, most of the time, it's able to accurately understand and respond to the input. How? Matrices.
author: Anisha Kalgi
